name: Dark Miracles
description:
Turn based strategy game mixed with card game.

How to play:

Step 0: Start the game and wait for the opponent (ask friend to join - it will bu fun :D)

Step 1: Hire unit

Step 2: Move all units

Step 3: Use card to create miracles

Step 4: Roll dice for possible card bonus

Step 5: Wait for the opponent turn

You will win if you defeat opponent's king unit.  If your unit is close to the building, like a house or a well, it will became yours. Houses give bits each turn and wells power. Use bits to hire units, use power to activate cards and do miracles. All units have range attack, after each turn your unit will try to attack your opponent within the range.

Extra asset used: PUN 2 (for multiplayer)

Known bugs:

  • Sometimes unit models are not fully synchronised over a network
  • Some cards are not 'calculating' cost properly and showing 0 instead
  • "Dice Protection" cards are only last 1 turn

Please report any bugs if you like this game to be better ;)
